workflows.description: Fetch invoice data from the API and store it in the invoices variable. This script will run when the page loads and populate the table with invoice data from get_invoices.data, specifically extracting the personName and totalAmount fields.

workflows.name: Fetch Invoices

display.code:
const roll_id = "rol_x3L8BKRZj4MXPfqP"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)
return find_data ? "Flex" : "None"
//return find_data ? "None" : "Flex"

display.code:
const roll_id = "rol_x3L8BKRZj4MXPfqP"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)

return find_data ? "None" : "Flex"
